name: TheGuys
description:
Story

You are Hercules, the strongest firefighter evert! You receive the order from commissioner, evacuate people in this building as much as you can. But the bad news is all exit stair are jammed, no one can escape, but you figure out one way, smash ground of each floor. Now, let's do this!

Features 。Time is limited, stamina is unlimited.

You need to rescue people in limited time. If reach certain score, you will gain additional time.

。Dangerous everywhere.

Fire may not hurt you, but there still have some threat hiding in that building, like jason the killer and unstable gas barrel, get away from them as quick as you can!

。Hanji collection is ready.

This building live a special species named Hanji, they like to dress in different costume, we prepare you a list to collect them up, go rescue them then you'll unlock their picture.

Contact Us Gmail: Infini Studio
Facebook: The Guys Fanspage
